mapper.select: SELECT pt.ctitle FROM t_product_base pb LEFT JOIN t_product_translate pt ON pb.csku = pt.csku WHERE pb.csku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT C.icategory FROM t_product_category_mapper C WHERE C.csku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_product_base
clistingid = #{clistingid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iwebsiteid = #{iwebsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
csku = #{csku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
istatus = #{istatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dnewformdate = #{dnewformdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dnewtodate = #{dnewtodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bspecial = #{bspecial,jdbcType=BIT},
cvideoaddress = #{cvideoaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iqty = #{iqty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fprice = #{fprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fcostprice = #{fcostprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fweight = #{fweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bmultiattribute = #{bmultiattribute,jdbcType=BIT},
cparentsku = #{cparentsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bvisible = #{bvisible,jdbcType=BIT},

ccreateuser = #{ccreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

bmain = #{bmain,jdbcType=BIT},
bactivity = #{bactivity,jdbcType=BIT},
saleprice = #{saleprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
tariff = #{tariff,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
carriage = #{carriage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
local_ref_price = #{localRefPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

distprice = #{distprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_profit_rate = #{disProfitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_profit_rate = #{reProfitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_profit = #{disProfit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_profit = #{reProfit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_vat = #{disVat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_vat = #{reVat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_stock_fee = #{disStockFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_stock_fee = #{reStockFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_shipping_type = #{disShippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re_shipping_type = #{reShippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dis_other_cost = #{disOtherCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_other_cost = #{reOtherCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_total_cost = #{disTotalCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_total_cost = #{reTotalCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_transfer_fee = #{disTransferFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
re_transfer_fee = #{reTransferFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
batch_number = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
postal_rate = #{postalRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
platform_fee = #{platformFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
postal_fee = #{postalFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
import_tar = #{importTar,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gst = #{gst,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vat = #{vat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pack_qty = #{packQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_enterprise = #{productEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component_content = #{componentContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expiration_days = #{expirationDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_type = #{packageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin_country = #{originCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plug_type = #{plugType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inter_bar_code = #{interBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
list_fee = #{listFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
insurance = #{insurance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_list_fee = #{disListFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_trade_fee = #{disTradeFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_pay_fee = #{disPayFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_postal_fee = #{disPostalFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_import_tar = #{disImportTar,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_gst = #{disGst,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_insurance = #{disInsurance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dis_total_vat = #{disTotalVat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bbc_visible = #{bbcVisible,jdbcType=BIT},
ordinary_msite_visible = #{ordinaryMsiteVisible,jdbcType=BIT},
brand_msite_visible = #{brandMsiteVisible,jdbcType=BIT},
where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
